# ASPOL Website Project - Next.js + Tailwind CSS

## ✅ Project Complete with Multi-Language Support

All tasks have been successfully completed with full internationalization!

## Project Details
- **Type**: Next.js 16 with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS v4
- **Purpose**: Website for ASPOL (Association des Étudiants Polonais en France)
- **Design**: Modern, clean aesthetic with smooth animations and scroll effects
- **Languages**: English (primary), French (secondary), Polish (third)
- **Real Data**: Integrated from aspol.fr and social media

## Components Created

1. **Header** - Fixed navigation with scroll effects and language switcher
2. **Hero** - Eye-catching landing section with animations (multilingual)
3. **About** - Real ASPOL mission and initiatives (Paris Polish Forum, Mentoring, etc.)
4. **Events** - Real ASPOL events with localized descriptions
5. **Contact** - Contact form with real social media integration
6. **Footer** - Social links and legal information (multilingual)

## Tech Stack

- Next.js 16 (App Router)
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS v4
- Inter font (Google Fonts)
- React Context API (for language management)
- Smooth scroll animations
- Responsive design

## Real ASPOL Data Integrated

- **Mission**: Building prosperous future between Poland and France
- **Initiatives**: 
  - Paris Polish Forum conferences
  - Mentoring programme for Polish students
  - Regular community meet-ups in Paris
- **Social Media**:
  - Facebook: @aspologne
  - Instagram: @aspolska
  - LinkedIn: ASPOL - Association des Étudiants Polonais en France
- **Website**: aspol.fr

## Running the Project

```bash
npm run dev    # Development server at http://localhost:3000
npm run build  # Production build
npm start      # Production server
```

## Design Features

- **Multi-language support** with easy language switcher (EN/FR/PL)
- Fade-in animations on scroll
- Gradient text and backgrounds in Polish red tones
- Modern typography with Inter font
- Smooth transitions and hover effects
- Mobile-responsive layout
- Fixed header with backdrop blur on scroll
- Real social media integration
